sentences.en: A portion of the shortfall comes from De Beers selling diamond mines in 2008.
sentences.cn: 其中的部分减产,是由于戴比尔斯2008年出售了一些钻矿.

sentences.en: By tradition, crops from Gaza make up the shortfall.
sentences.cn: 依传统, 加沙地带的谷物将弥补这一缺口.

sentences.en: Even assuming growth of 15 %, the shortfall would be some $ 400 billion.
sentences.cn: 即使假设增幅为15%, 资金缺口仍将约为4千亿美元.

sentences.en: In case of any shortfall , an election of additional independent supervisors shall be timely held.
sentences.cn: 独立监察人席次如有不足时, 应适时办理增补选事宜.

sentences.en: In theory, excess savings produce trade surpluses, and vice - versa, savings shortfall means deficits, he acknowledged.
sentences.cn: 理论上, 储蓄过量就回造成贸易顺差, 反之亦然, 储蓄短缺就意味着贸易逆差.

sentences.en: NATO says there is a shortfall of about 2,300 mentors.
sentences.cn: 北约说,这里缺少大约2300名指导员.

sentences.en: New factories in Cambodia and Vietnam will make up the shortfall.
sentences.cn: 剩余的产量将由它在柬埔寨和越南的新设工厂来填补.

sentences.en: That is the largest budget shortfall adjusted for inflation - since 1945.
sentences.cn: 把通货膨胀因素考虑在内,这个预算赤字是1945年以来最为庞大的.

sentences.en: The Family Trust then sued the Flemings for the shortfall on the sale and interest.
sentences.cn: 家庭信托随后起诉复莱明,索两者差价及利息.

sentences.en: The government has refused to make up a $30,000 shortfall in funding.
sentences.cn: 政府已经拒绝补足3万美元的资金短缺。

sentences.en: The UNHCR says it has a shortfall of $ 11.9 million.
sentences.cn: 难民署说,目前一共短缺1190万美元的资金.

sentences.en: There will be a shortfall in wheat supplies this year.
sentences.cn: 今年的小麦供应会有一定数量的短缺.

sentences.en: There will soon be a shortfall in supply of qualified young people.
sentences.cn: 合格年轻人才的短缺将很快出现.

sentences.en: There's still a huge shortfall in our funds.
sentences.cn: 我们的资金还有很大缺口.

sentences.en: We have to borrow money to cover the shortfall between expenditure and revenue.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不借钱以弥补收支间的差额.

trans.tran_en: the difference between the amount you have and the amount you need or expect
